author: jgm
content:
```
go build -tags osusergo,netgo -ldflags='-extldflags=-static'
```

Would create a binary without a dependency on libc.

author: ryanleeschneider
content:
If the project is 100% Go (e.g. no CGo is used) you can also do `CGO_ENABLED=0 go build ...`

edit: but looks like mev-boost is built off geth and thus requires CGO, so won't work in this case
